title: Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: SECTION 9TH FLOOR PLAN - BROWN PALACE HOTEL - SHOWING FURNITURE AND DECORATIONS SCALE 1/4"=1'/HAVENS INTERIORS - CONSULTANT ARCHITECTS AND DECORATORS; upper center: TREMONT ST.; center left: 17TH ST; upper left in rounded room: LIBRARY - PINE PANELED/RUG BLUE GREEN CUTRAINS/GREEN AND BIEGE/FURNITURE PICKLED MHG.; at right: LIVING ROOM PINE DADO/WALL PAPER ABOVE. RUG/GREEN. CURTAINS BEIGE/CASE WORK . MAPLE; at right: LIVING ROOM DADO MAPLE . WALLS/YELLOW - RUG.BROWN-CURTAINS YELLOW/AND BROWN-CASE WORK MAPLE; at right: BED/DADO PAINTED BIEGE-WALLS LIGHT/YELLOW RUG BROWN-FURNITURE/MAPLE-CURTAINS CORAL; at right: LIVING ROOM. DADO WALNUT-HORIZONTAL/STRIPE PAPER-CASE WORK WALNUT-RUG BROWN-CURTAINS VERMILLION; lower, far left: BED ROOM. CHAIR AND BASE/PAINTED GR. WALL GREEN AND TAN/PAPER. CURTAINS GREEN/ALL CASE WORK MAPLE RUG/GREEN. 3 VENETIAN BLINDS; at right: FIXTURES MING GREEN/WALLS 31" HIGH DARK MHG/ABOVE CREAM 7'2"/RUBBER TILE/FLOOR; at right: KITCHEN WHITE/GREEN AND/BLACK/LINOLEUM FLOOR; at right: KITCHEN CREAM/BLACK AND GREEN/LINOEUM FLOOR; at right: PAINT CREAM/RUBBER TILE FLOOR; at right: DRESSING ROOM PAINTED/BEIGE BROWN AND VERMILLION/RUBBER TILE FLOOR; at right: KITCHEN WHITE/RED AND BROWN/LINOLEUM FLOOR
description: Floor plans and furniture layout for 9th floor of hotel. Hotel rooms with bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, closets, living rooms, dressing rooms and library.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936.
1936. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-410.
